title: Best of The Herd: 07/30/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/30/2018
description:
Colin discusses New England Patriots QB Tom Brady's response to WR Julian Edelman's suspension, why LeBron James signing with the Los Angeles Lakers will work, why Dallas Cowboys fans should be happy, and where he was right and wrong. Also, senior NFL reporter Albert Breer stops by The Herd. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
